GLOWNAME_DESCRIPTION: Changes the name of a selected Glow
GLOW_NOT_FOUND: {{author}} The **Glow** code you provided is either invalid or not in your inventory
GLOW_NAME_LONG: {{author}} The name of your **Glow** can only be **25** characters long
GLOW_NAME_EXISTS: {{author}} That name is already assigned to a different **Glow**
PROFANE_GLOW_NAME: {{author}} The name of your **Glow** must not contain profanity or derogatory words
GLOWNAME_CHANGE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to change the name of your **Glow** from `{{oldName}}` to `{{newName}}`?
MISSING_ITEMS: {{author}} You don't have enough **{{currency}}** for this process
GLOWNAME_CHANGE_SUCCESSFUL: {{author}} Successfully changed the name of your **Glow** to `{{newName}}`
GLOWNAME_EXTRA_INFO: The name will only be changed in your own collection to the one of your preference
